Package View

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
View.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class GameBoard
extends javax.swing.JComponent
This is GameBoardView class, used to display game play and Pause Menu window.
Since:
24 November 2021
Version:
0.2
Author:
Chin Hong Shen
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • obscureGameBoard

      private void obscureGameBoard​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)

      g2d - represents Graphics2D class

      g2d - represents Graphics2D class
